item.description:
FAMILY MEMBERS, FIRST RESPONDERS & EXPERTS SPEAK OUT


Citizens for a New 9/11 Investigation
West Hartford, Connecticut
November 3, 2007

This Saturday conference will be accompanied by a lot of camaraderie and conversation late into the night before! Members of Merrimack Valley 911 Truth will be heading down after working hours Friday to check into our rooms in the West Hartford Inn.

See the site of the conference for more details: http://911Hartford.or...

----------------------------
CARPOOL DETAILS:
Start in Concord, pick ups in Manchester and Nashua, but we'll have to figure out which cars are going in advance to make this work, so please write to us at MerrimackValley911Truth@gmail.com to discuss.

ROOM SHARE DETAILS:
In addition, we have one room reserved at the West Hartford Inn, but they most likely have others available. If you want to make this an economy trip, please join us for a room share to lower everyone's costs.
item.name: 9/11: Family Members, First Responders & Experts Speak Out
